name: Anthony SCOTT, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Scott v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Anthony SCOTT, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of November, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
102 A.3d 1253
Anthony SCOTT, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 153 EM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 13, 2014.
